segments.text: I heard you are going out with John ?

segments.text: Yes . To be frank , I really love him to death .

segments.text: Why ? Are you kidding me ? A guy like that is hard to find . Few boys are so caring , so patient , and did I mention he is hottie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Totally . I am saying it from the bottom of my heart ! And it's obvious that he â€™ s head over heels in love with you , too .
